**Welcome to Let's Do Digital** – Where Innovation Meets Healthcare! At Let's Do Digital, we are dedicated to transforming the future of healthcare through education and collaboration. Join our vibrant community of healthcare professionals, educators, and tech enthusiasts to access comprehensive resources, connect with like-minded individuals, and explore innovative ideas. Together, we can revolutionise digital healthcare and make a lasting impact. Dive in, explore, and start your journey with us today!

## Updates

**03/04/25** - We are now offer bite-sized modules in digital health. These 1-1.5 hour modules are designed to be flexible and can be taken at your own pace. They are perfect for busy healthcare professionals looking to upskill in digital health. Check out the modules available in the [tickets](/tickets/index.qmd) section above.

**21/01/25** - We are excited to announce our 3rd series of the Programming in healthcare course. We have had some amazing feedback from our previous cohorts and we are looking forward to welcoming new participants. The course will cover Python programming and its use in healthcare. Register now to secure your spot by clicking the ticket link above!

**15/01/25** - Take your clinical practice to the next level! Join the Data Analytics in Medicine (DAIM) course to: Learn Python for medical data & imaging. Explore machine learning & AI in healthcare. Gain hands-on coding skills with expert support. See the tickets section above to book your place now!

## How to get involved

Do you want to get involved in current Let's Do Digital projects? Do you have a webinar series, course or app that you want to get off the ground with the help of the Let's Do Digital. Come join us for networking, collaboration and innovation. Email the team at
[Let's Do Digital](mailto:info@letsdodigital.org). Better yet, join our forum at [Digital Health Discourse](https://discourse.digitalhealth.net/g/lets-do-digital).
